title: Watch Angelina Jolie Feed Her Children Literal Spiders & Scorpions!
text:
Angelina Jolie may not want to go into detail about her divorce with Brad Pitt , but she's certainly willing to show off her culinary skills!
The actress and her children were recently in Cambodia filming her latest passion project First They Killed My Father , when she decided to cook some local cuisine for everyone.
And you better believe Angie's Cambodian cookout means frying up some predatory bugs!
BBC 's Yalda Hakim joined in on the family dinner, which included the 41-year-old actress showing her 8-year-old twins Knox and Vivienne how to "take the fangs out" of the spiders. Just regular motherly kitchen tips!
Related: Angelina Comes For Trump's Muslim Ban! 
Jolie admitted she wasn't always a pro when it came to eating bugs, explaining:
"I first had them when I was first in country. Crickets â€” you start with crickets. Crickets and a beer, and then you kind of move up to tarantulas."
And you thought Jennifer Aniston 's diet was intenseâ€¦
Nowadays, it looks like the filmmaker's refined, worldly taste for insects and arachnids has passed on to her children. In the clip, the kids don't hesitate to chow down on spiders, crickets, and even scorpions.
10-year-old Shiloh even shares a spider with mom! Don't worry, the bugs taste like "dry chips," according to Knox.
Watch the video (below) to see Angie pull apart and fry terrifying insects!
